PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-05932003-05-01,  TC,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, IV AND V) by, inter alia, introducing section 507.13 intitled "Replacing a Lost or Destroyed Flight Authority", which clarifies the obligations of the Minister of Transport and the registered owner of an aircraft with respect to the replacement of a lost or destroyed flight authority.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0154 Publication Date: 2003-05-21
AttachmentsAttachment
